references.paper_title: Mobile-agent: Autonomous multi-modal mobile device agent with visual perception
references.reason: This paper is the author's previous work and a likely foundation to this current paper, so has been included.

references.paper_title: Appagent: Multimodal agents as smartphone users
references.reason: AppAgent is a key baseline that the authors are comparing against their current proposed model.

references.paper_title: Mobile-agent-v2: Mobile device operation assistant with effective navigation via multi-agent collaboration
references.reason: This paper is the author's previous work, which is the upgraded version, has been included.

references.paper_title: Improved baselines with visual instruction tuning
references.reason: This paper focuses on improving visual instruction tuning, which is related to this current work.

references.paper_title: Towards general computer control: A multimodal agent for red dead redemption ii as a case study
references.reason: This paper focuses on enabling general computer control through multimodal agents, which closely aligns with the goals of this project.
